channel.title: Ipv6 Cisco on it-ninja
channel.description: Recent content in Ipv6 Cisco on it-ninja

item.title: EIGRP
item.description: Features IP protocol 88. Used to be Cisco propetary. Now open RFC7868. Hybrid protocol, more like a link-state protocol than a vector distance protocol. Multiprotocol support including IPv4, IPv6 etc. Support for CIDR and VLSM. Diffusing update algorithm (DUAL). Complex metric based on: Bandwidth, on by default. Delay, on by default. Load, off by default. Reliability, off by default. Accepts CIDR and VLSM wildcard in network route process command.
